idea:
Buywon India's Own Retail Aggregator

We are Indian owned online retail aggregator. We are based on a patent published by our company for Safe delivery of goods and services when bought online and offline. We have a different approach in terms of business model and delivery systems for ecommerce. We aim to be the biggest player in the e commerce retail space.

idea:
Xpert Property Management is one of the few companies in India that goes beyond operational excellence. In addition to facing the challenges of handling larger and more complex campuses, we have proven to our worthy clients that we can also ensure compliance with national and international law, regulation and good practices of environment, sustainability, health and safety.

We are single-source solution providers to every requirement in the arena of facility management. Enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of your limited space and work environment through a collaborative approach is our forte. Clients regards us as the company that keeps its customers because it treats them and their assets so well.

We are able to maintain and sparkle your assets because we invest so heavily in our diverse human assets. This empowers Xpert to be a market leader through Exceptional Service, Exceptional People.
name: XPERT PROPERTY MANAGEMENT SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: ExoTalent is a one-stop solution for all your recruitment, consulting and outsourcing needs. Backed by decades of industry experience, our team comprises of experts and consultants with a strong focus on Automotive, Manufacturing and Technology. Our obsession with quality has earned us a high reputation with some of the most respected brands in the industry.
name: EXOTALENT CONSULTANCY SERVICES LLP
